name: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence V210
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the fourcc code V210.  This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.
